Description of incident: A desktop computer was stolen from            a secured area within Cabell Library in mid-April. The computer may            have contained student names, Social Security numbers and test scores            dating from October 2005 to the present. VCU discontinued use of Social            Security numbers as ID numbers in January 2007. An additional 22,500            students are being notified that their names and test scores may have            also been on the computer. No Social Security numbers were recorded            with those names, but computer-generated student ID numbers may have            been.
